name: Space Defense.
description:
In this game the Ship fights against the Tower Defense player.

The Ship has to get to the end to win.

The Tower Defense player has to kill the ship to win.

Controls:

   WASD to move the ship.

   Space to shoot out of the ship.

   Click on screen to place towers.

   Scroll to switch between towers.

Credits to SawSquareNoise for the music at https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/dojokratos/stage-1.
